title: Build Creative Request
description: Request parameters for building creative assets using AI-powered creative generation

adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version for this request

message.description: Natural language description of the creative brief or requirements

source_format_id.description: Format ID of existing creative to transform (optional - omit when creating from scratch). Supports namespaced IDs like 'display_300x250' (standard) or 'https://publisher.com/.well-known/adcp/sales:custom_format' (custom)

target_format_id.description: Format ID to generate. Supports namespaced IDs like 'display_300x250' (standard) or 'https://publisher.com/.well-known/adcp/sales:custom_format' (custom). The format definition specifies whether output is manifest-based or code-based.

context_id.description: Optional context ID for iterative creative refinement

assets.description: Available assets to use in creative generation

brand_manifest.description: Brand information manifest providing context for creative generation. Replaces brand_guidelines with a more comprehensive and standardized format.

promoted_products.description: Products or offerings being promoted in this creative. Supports SKU selection from brand manifest's product catalog, or inline offerings for non-commerce campaigns.

asset_filters.description: Filters to select specific assets from the brand manifest's asset library

tags.description: Select assets matching any of these tags (e.g., ['holiday', 'winter'])
